Description.Text: Quality Hotel Times Square is a comfortable 3-star hotel perfectly located in the very heart of the Broadway Theater District. This stylish hotel is a great place to stay for visitors who want to enjoy all that New York City has to offer. The Quality Hotel Times Square offers budget conscious accommodations in Midtown Manhattan's popular tourist district. The glamour of Times Square and Broadway are less than two blocks from the hotel. Nearby on West 46th Street, guests may find more than 20 dining choices for any budget on Restaurant Row.

• Carnegie Hall • Central Park • Chrysler Building • Ellis Island • Empire State Building • Intrepid Air Museum • Madison Square Garden • Museum of TV and Radio • Radio City Music Hall • Restaurant Row • Rockefeller Center • Saks Fifth Avenue • St Patrick's Cathedral • Statue of Liberty • Theater District • Times Square

Hotel's exquisite renovated deluxe suites are among the 146 stylish accommodations, and all have sitting rooms for entertainment, relaxing or small business meetings. Penthouse Suite, with executive leather sofa, circular ottoman and dark mahogany fireplace, offers a warm inviting environment ideal for the discriminating executive as well as for that special occasion. The all-purpose Penthouse conference room offers high-tech audio/visual equipment and elegant space for entertaining, truly one of the city's most desirable meeting facilities.Each room features color cable TV including HBO, phones with data ports, modern bathrooms, inroom movies, iron and ironing boards, hairdryers, in-room safes, coffee makers, and truly attractive furnishings for the perfect relaxation.

The hotel is a historic 1930s construction. A 24 hour front desk is available and a concierge may arrange taxi transportation or assist with entertainment advice. Guestrooms are comfortable, no surprise given the incredible location near Times Square. All rooms are furnished with satellite televisions, coffee makers, laptop size safes, and complimentary wireless Internet access. Suites feature separate seating areas. The Quality Hotel Times Square's enviable location in Midtown Manhattan makes it an ideal value accommodation for touring guests exploring New York City.
Pets: Pets are not allowed. Check-In :15:00 Hours Check-Out :12:00 Hours Accepted credit cards : - American Express - Visa - Euro/MasterCard - Discover

From the Lincoln Tunnel, make a left onto 10th Avenue. Go down 10th Avenue until 48th Street, on 48th Street turn right onto 6th Avenue (Avenue of the Americas), turn left onto 47th Stree

Quality Hotel New York Times Square features a single restaurant serving all three meals. The International cuisine is delicious and will have guests coming back for more. • La Prima Donna - onsite restaurant

Nestled in the Heart of Broadway Theater District in the city that never sleeps, the Quality Hotel Times Square is the premier destination for visitors who want to enjoy the lights on Broadway, Fifth Avenue shopping and famed 42nd Street.
